UML:TaggedValue.value: This package contains framework packages for information modelling. These include: - elements of the ISO 19100 series of standards relating to Geographic Information. Of particular interest are: - the General Feature Model (ISO 19109), an upper-level model or meta-model for information types, to be used as the basis for domain models presenting an object-centric view of spatial information - the Coverage model (ISO 19123) which provides an alternative property-centric view of spatial information - cross-domain utility classes, including basic types (ISO 19103), spatial schema (ISO 19107), temporal schema (ISO 19108), coordinate reference systems (ISO 19111) - elements required for registration and governance (ISO 19110, ISO 19135) - service descriptions and profiles (ISO 19119, ISO 19128, ISO 19132) - models associated with the OGC Sensor Web Enablement initiative - additional packages of cross-domain interest, which have not yet been formally adopted by a recognised governance authority
